alert.note: Alert for Barton; Russell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 01 at 2:12PM CST until December 03 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM FRIDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the first Wind Advisory, south winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. For the second Wind Advisory, west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Russell and Barton Counties. * WHEN...For the first Wind Advisory, until 10 PM CST this evening. For the second Wind Advisory, from 9 AM Friday to midnight CST Friday night. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
